articles.author: GERALD IMRAY
articles.title: Why hundreds of miners are still trapped and feared starving in an abandoned South Africa mine - The Associated Press
articles.description: South African authorities have come under intense scrutiny for their response after civic groups said hundreds of miners have been trapped deep in an abandoned gold mine for months. More than 100 of them are believed to have died of starvation or dehydration.…
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) South African authorities have come under intense scrutiny for their response after civic groups said hundreds of miners have been trapped deep in an abandoned gold mine … [+3629 chars]
